block.p: FINANCIAL COMMERCE NETWORK INC., New York, a financial services Web site, said it would acquire Rascals International Inc., Springfield, N.J., an operator of comedy clubs and restaurants. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

SUPERIOR INDUSTRIES INTERNATIONAL, Van Nuys, Calif., a maker of automobile wheels and other parts, plans to double the size of a plant in Heber Springs, Ark., to meet rising orders for aluminum suspension parts.
